overview_of_class: The course introduces teaching and learning strategies that aid course participants in becoming effective educators in the secondary school setting. Emphasizing current research, the course is a comprehensive study of teaching methods in mathematics. Lesson and unit planning and assessment of student learning are elements of the seminar.
name: Methods and Techniques: Secondary Mathematics
title: SESP TEACH_ED 357-0-20 Methods and Techniques: Secondary Mathematics
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-Registration - Reserved for SESP Students.

Emphasizing current research, the course is a comprehensive study of teaching methods in mathematics. Lesson and unit planning and assessment of student learning are elements of the seminar.
